data.title: Ryan Phillippe: "I'm Tired of Getting S*** on" Over Reese Split
data.meta_description: When a rep for actress Abbie Cornish told UsMagazine.com in February that she had broken up with Ryan Phillippe, at least one person was surprised: Ryan Phillippe. I have a new rule: not to date anyone who has a publicist, Phillippe quipped during a Monday radio interview on Howard Sterns Sirius XM radio sho.
data.text:
When a rep for actress Abbie Cornish told UsMagazine.com in February that she had broken up with Ryan Phillippe, at least one person was surprised: Ryan Phillippe.

âI have a new rule: not to date anyone who has a publicist,â Phillippe quipped during a Monday radio interview on Howard Sternâs Sirius XM radio sho.

The actor explained that he and Cornish had privately ended their four-year romance face-to-face â but no one had warned him of an impending public statement claiming Cornish had dumped him.

âWho announces a breakup? I donât understand that! Thereâs no need for that.â

Phillippe added, âIâve been dumped on in the press for relationship stuff since Reese [Witherspoon] and I divorced.â Phillippe and Cornish began dating in 2006 â the same year he and Witherspoon split after seven years of marriage.

PHOTOS: Was Reese an âOscar curseâ victim?

âIâm tired of getting s*** on,â Phillippe, 35, told Stern. âI donât feel like I deserve it. Things happen! How many people have you broken up with over your life?â

The actor and Witherspoon now share joint custody of their daughter Ava, 10, and son Deacon, 6 â and, he said, âitâs gotten to a place where weâre great friends and great co-parents.â Such great friends, in fact, that they console each other after breakups.

âAfter I had my breakup, she called, and after she did, I called.â Witherspoon, 34, called it quits with Jake Gyllenhaal in early December after nearly three years together.

Phillippe didnât have much to say about Witherspoonâs new beau, Jim Toth. âI trust her to make the right decisions around our children,â he said simply âI hope she feels the same way.â

He points out that his kids donât get too invested in their parentsâ dating lives. âIf the kids care about mom dad, and if thatâs consistent and they feel protected that way, they donât they donât really care so much about who the parent is dating. They just donât.â

To Howard Sternâs chagrin, Phillippe also reveals that he and his ex-wife have not had âex sex.â âThat hasnât happened,â he told the shock jock.

Since the Cornish split, he said heâs âenjoying the single-ishâ life, although he calls himself a âserial monogamist..Either a girl is worth spending all of my time with or none of my time.â He shoots down rumors that heâs hooked up with Victoriaâs Secret model Selita Ebanks, Lindsay Lohan or Jessica Simpson. âIâve never met Jessica Simpson!â
